title: Pliny Ep 9 21 - we learn from the first sentence

content.question: From the first sentence we can infer that

choices.label: Pliny had once owned this freedman
Pliny was aware that there was a problem before the freedman arrived
the freedman was reluctant to walk to Pliny's home

content.answer: Pliny was aware that there was a problem before the freedman arrived
